body_content.explanation: a night in the highest latitudes of the earth (= the areas that are furthest north or south) when it never gets completely dark, or is only dark for a very short time :
examples: The music celebrates the midsummer white nights of St Petersburg.
Daylight stretches across the sky as our train travels north through a white night of midsummer.

body_content.explanation: a night when you do not sleep:
examples: Ideas were whirling around in my head as I struggled through another bout of insomnia, yet another white night.
Not a great deal of sleeping went on in this apartment, and we shared many a communal white night.
